description:
It’s now up to Koichi and the rest of JUDA to hold back the launch of the SPHEREs.  However, Yamashita has a different mobilization unit out, after receiving a letter designating him to fulfill a special duty surrounding a secret reunion around the base of Mt. Fuji near the Aokigahara Sea of Trees.  As Koichi races towards Yamashita, he is completely unaware of what is awaiting for him there…
Source: crunchyroll
